paper_abstract: In this paper, the notions of L-fuzzy convex sets and L-fuzzy numbers are introduced where L is a completely distributive lattice. The notions of [0, 1]-fuzzy convex sets and [0, 1]-fuzzy numbers are generalized. Furthermore their properties and characterizations are presented in terms of cut sets of L-fuzzy sets.
